name: @ngx-meta/bundle-size
description: ngx-meta lib bundle size analysis with source-map-explorer

scripts.v15:sme-json: mkdir -p v15 && pnpm run --silent v15:analyze-main-bundle --json > v15/source-map-explorer.json
scripts.v16:sme-json: mkdir -p v16 && pnpm run --silent v16:analyze-main-bundle --json > v16/source-map-explorer.json
scripts.v17:sme-json: mkdir -p v17 && pnpm run --silent v17:analyze-main-bundle --json > v17/source-map-explorer.json
